title: Northeast Metro Tech Mourns the Passing of Beloved Teacher Raymond Nicolosi - John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
content: Northeast Metro Tech Mourns the Passing of Beloved Teacher Raymond Nicolosi  John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
description: WAKEFIELD — Superintendent David DiBarri is deeply saddened to report that one of Northeast Metro Tech’s most beloved teachers, Raymond S. Nicolosi Jr., died on Friday at age 46 after a long battle with cancer. “It fills me with a deep sense of sorrow to report to the community that Ray Nicolosi passed away after […]
